Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: Depict two students holding cups connected by a string (basic representation of a string telephone).
Show the string connecting the two cups (illustrates a basic understanding of how sound travels).
Identify some of the materials involved (e.g., cups and string) without understanding their purpose.
CANNOT: Accurately illustrate the concept of sound traveling through the string (may not show how sound vibrations work).
Show the function of the string telephone for long-distance communication (student may not grasp distance concept).
Explain or represent how the device solves the communication problem (lacks understanding of communication purpose).
Correctly identify light or sound as the method of communication (might confuse light and sound usage).
